text: Self portrait as Feldwebel, 1941 Wolfgang Willrich (March 31, 1897 – 1948) was a German artist of the twentieth century. During World War II, he did a series of portraits of prominent German soldiers and sailors that were issued as postcards.Peters, Klaus J. Wolfgang Willrich: War Artist = Kriegszeichner. San Jose, Calif: R. James Bender Pub, 1990. ==References == Category:20th-century German artists Category:1897 births Category:1948 deaths Category:German portrait painters Category:German war artists Category:SS personnel
title: Wolfgang Willrich
